mapper.select: select m.menu_id,m.parent_id,m.name,m.url,m.perms,m.type,m.icon,m.order_num,m.gmt_create,m.gmt_modified,m.gmt_modified from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id=rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on ur.role_id=rm.role_id where ur.user_id=#{user_id} and m.type in(0,1) order by m.order_num
